Template.TextPart:
Welcome to OnWhichDate
Thank you for creating an account at OnWhichDate.com! Your login account is m.v@gmail.com. We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, enter your email and fill the one-time code e-mailed to you. Even better, just use SMS text for quick additions.
Let's get started. Head over to https://onwhichdate.com and add some some important documents to get started. We suggest:

passport
driving license
mobile phone subscription

Play around the account and set your defaults, they'll help you save a ton of time!
We hope to serve you years to come!
sincerely, 
OWD team.
Template.HtmlPart:
Welcome to OnWhichDate

Thank you for creating an account at OnWhichDate.com! Your login account is m.v@gmail.com. We have no passwords! Whenever you need to login, enter your email and fill the one-time code e-mailed to you. Even better, just use SMS text for quick additions.

Let's get started. Head over to https://onwhichdate.com and add some some important documents to get started. We suggest:

  1. passport
  2. driving license
  3. mobile phone subscription

Play around the account and set your defaults, they'll help you save a ton of time!

We hope to serve you years to come!

sincerely,

OWD team.
